summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 21st Avenue Southwest from West Roxbury Street to Delridge Way; and certain other streets, avenues, and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15608 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
